summary: Incomplete item reforging system (more info at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47212/?) initially started by OmniBruce. This file is intended to be seen by the original creator and not meant to be downloaded by others.
descriptionHtml:
Incomplete item reforging system (more info at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47212/?) initially started by OmniBruce. This file is intended to be seen by the original creator and not meant to be downloaded by others. file only has work done for bows for concept idea.

-Installation-
Extract archive contents to Skyrim/Data folder.
author: xScyther
